participant_1.background:
I have a dog and a cat, and they are my best friends.
I take my iguana outside to bask in the sun.
I have two weaknesses: my eyes and my driving skills.
I miss being able to run around in the woods behind my house without a care in the world.
My family is not involved in my career.

participant_2.background:
I have moved a lot in my life, but I have found it to be a great way to learn about new places and cultures.
my favorite food is a cheeseburger.
I am an only child, so I have to make my own fun.
i drink a lot of caffeine.
My relationship with my boss is still in its early stages.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a bit of a loner, but I'm trying to get out more. What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I'm an only child, so I've always had to make my own fun. I like going to concerts and hanging out with friends.
Nice! I'm not big on concerts, but I love hanging out with friends. I also really enjoy spending time with my pets.
Pets are great! I have a dog and a cat, and they're my best friends. What kind of pets do you have?
I have a dog and a cat too! They're the best.
That's awesome! What are their names?
My dog's name is Buddy, and my cat's name is Mittens.
Those are great names! I love animals, so I'm always happy to talk about them.
Me too! They're such a great source of comfort and love.
Totally! I'm glad we're on the same page about pets.
Me too! I'm always happy to meet someone who loves animals as much as I do.
